results.name: Triangle of coefficients of ordered cycle-index polynomials: T(n,k) = binomial(n,k)*Bell(k)*Bell(n-k).
reference: J. Riordan, An Introduction to Combinatorial Analysis, Wiley, 1958, p. 80.
maple: if k < 0 or k > n then
b:= proc(n) option remember; expand(`if`(n>0, add(
T:= n-> (p-> seq(coeff(p, x, i), i=0..n))(b(n)):
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Binomial[n, k] * BellB[k] * BellB[n-k]; Table[t[n, k], {n, 0, 9}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 14 2014 *)
xref: Cf. A000110, row sums give A001861.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
